ThingDef.label: torn note
ThingDef.description: Metal weapon scraps thare are broken and unusable. Can be smelted to recover resources.

ThingDef.label: a strange book
ThingDef.description: Upon closer inspection, this book appears to be quite ancient. Its cover is made of rough, worn leather, and the spine is held together by a series of intricate brass fastenings. The pages within are yellowed with age, and filled with strange symbols and arcane diagrams. Upon further examination, it becomes clear that this book contains a collection of research schematics for intermediate cooking recipes, military weapons such as blades, maces, and polearms, as well as light crossbows. It is unclear who wrote it, or for what purpose, but one thing is certain: this book holds secrets that have been lost to time, and could be of great use to those who seek to unlock its secrets.

ThingDef.label: The Ancient Tome of Materialcraft
ThingDef.description: This ancient tome is bound in leather, with brass fastenings holding its spine together. Its pages are yellowed with age and filled with intricate diagrams and strange symbols. Upon closer examination, it becomes clear that this book contains a wealth of knowledge about advanced material processing techniques, including the creation of steel, tar, and gunpowder. It is unclear who wrote it or why, but one thing is certain: this book holds secrets that have been lost to time and could be of great value to those who seek to unlock its knowledge.

ThingDef.label: The Ancient Tome of War, Defense and delicious Food
ThingDef.description: TThis ancient tome is bound in the finest leather, with intricate gold fastenings holding its spine together. Its pages are crisp and well-preserved, filled with detailed diagrams and ancient script. Upon closer examination, it becomes clear that this book contains a wealth of knowledge about the creation of noble weapons such as blades, maces, polearms, and heavy crossbows. It also holds information on using crossbows for defensive structures, as well as the secrets to creating the juiciest food imaginable. It is unclear who wrote it or why, but it is certain that this book is the most valuable of its kind and could be of great use to those who seek to unlock its secrets.
